properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 3:34PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain will be possible. Total ice accumulations
up to around two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35
mph.

* WHERE...St. Clair and Macomb Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to fall to near
freezing early Saturday afternoon. There remains uncertainty
where the line of freezing temperatures and therefore freezing
rain will advance through the day Saturday, which will dictate
which areas see the highest ice accumulations. Currently the
freezing line looks to stall across northern Macomb and St
Clair Counties resulting in a large gradient of ice accumulation
from northwest to southeast across those counties.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
